Title: Relates to out-of-network treatment disclosure for certain surgical procedures
Summary: Requires out-of-network treatment disclosure within twenty-four hours of approval of certain surgical procedures.
LawCode: Amd ยง230-d, add ยง2807-g, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to out-of-network treatment disclosure for certain surgical procedures
